item.description:
We are long overdue for a happy hour.

This place is right in Harvard Sq AND has a roof deck. A roof deck!!!
I've never been there, but I've heard it's a great little place.

Let's meet around 7:30 (its okay to be late. I'll be there at least til 8:30) on the roof deck, near the bar. I might try to find us some seats but it also might be crowded.

I'll email the RSVP my cell number, so just txt me or find our aweseome group when you get there.

It's gonna be fun, so why not join us :)))

http://www.daedalusha...
item.how_to_find_us: look for Sun (I'll send you my number to the RSVP)
item.name: Happy Hour
